title: Tech News: Grand Theft Data
itunes:title: Tech News: Grand Theft Data
description:
The makers of Grand Theft Auto are responding to a hacker who leaked dozens of videos of the next title in the series. Russia implies it might shoot down Starlink satellites. And Iran cracks down on the Internet in the wake of civil protests.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
The makers of Grand Theft Auto are responding to a hacker who leaked dozens of videos of the next title in the series. Russia implies it might shoot down Starlink satellites. And Iran cracks down on the Internet in the wake of civil protests.

itunes:keywords: Meta, Twitch, Rockstar Games, 2K Games, Grand Theft Auto, GTA, hacker, teapotuberhacker, Uber, whistleblower, data broker, data collection, privacy, security, Ron Wyden, Iran, Internet, telecommunications, Russia, Starlink, SpaceX, Elon Musk, Ukraine, Voxer, Apple, Instagram
